info.name: Yellows
info.description:
Most colours are available in matt & silk emulsion.

Matt emulsion finish gives your walls a modern look with no surface shine.  Rich and creamy perfect colour.  For use on walls & ceilings.

Silk emulsion finish gives your walls a wipeable finish with a slight shine.  Rich and creamy perfect colour.  For use on walls & ceilings.

Our Matt and Silk emulsion are Breatheasy.  99% Solvent Free.

All colours are available in a 2.5 litre pack size.  Some colours are also available in a 5 litre pack.

See www.crownpaint.co.uk to see more of our colours and inspiration.
